modName: Edge Sisters Marriable Essential or Mortal Ninja Followers
summary:
New companions: Noemy Edge(1h) and Amy Edge(bow)
Nuevos compa√±eros: Noemy Edge(1m) y Amy Edge(arco)
descriptionHtml:
Well i was thinking to make my own companions and...i like ninjas and girls so..,why i don\'t make ninja girls?lol
But i tried and tried without sucess,i asked for help and then a good person named [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1749632-grrb]GRRB[/url] came to my rescue! and then with his GREAT HELP i made this mod!
Noemy Edge is a 1h ninja warrior,she is good with light armor and loves katanas.
Amy Edge is an archer and likes the bows and is good with light armor.
You can found the Edge Sisters in Whiterun(Carrerablanca) near Arcadia\'s shop. -OLD VERSION-
Now you can found the Sisters in THE BANNERED MARE
Noemy And Amy are both avaliable to marry!
You can choose one or....you can have both with this great mod:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework[/url]

I prefer this one and if you want the sisters ride a horse with you use this: 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950]Convenient Horses[/url]

It\'s an awesome mod too!

=========
Required Files:
=========

SKYRIM 1.6.89.0.6
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachi Hair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18601]Hotaru By Nausicaa -CBBEv3M[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15955]Insanitys Dragon Katana[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14642]Neo Oriental Dress v1_20 CBBE UNP[/url]

=====
Optional:
=====

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2464]Bright Eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url]

=============
Installation/Instalacion:
=============

ENGLISH: 
USE NEXUS MOD MANAGER AND YOU CAN INSTALL THE MOD MORE EASLY,AND YOU CAN  UNISTALL IT MORE EASLY TOO,IF NOT,PUT THE .ESP WHERE YOU HAVE INSTALLED  SKYRIM IN DATA FOLDER,THEN THE TEXTURES FOLDER IN THE TEXTURES FOLDER XD AND MESHES...WHERE?O.O....IN MESHES OF COURSE NANAN


SPANISH: 
USA NEXUS MOD MANAGER Y PODRAS INSTALAR EL MOD MAS FACIL,Y DESINSTALARLO
MAS FACILMENTE,SI NO PON LOS EL ARCHIVO .ESP EN DONDE INSTALASTE SKYRIM,EN LA
CARPETA DATA,LUEGO LA CARPETA TEXTURES EN LA CARPETA TEXTURES XD
Y MESHES.....DONDE?O.O....EN MESHES CLARO JAJAJA

====================================================
EDIT: I FIXED THE MAX LVL TO 90! AND NOW YOU CAN FOUND THE SISTERS IN THE BANNERED MARE

====================================================

So That\'s all! Thanks SO MUCH to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1749632-grrb]GRRB[/url] for helping me! without his help i couldn\'t make this!You are literally my hero haha!
And of course thanks to the owners of the Dragon Katana,Apachi Hair,Extensible Followers,Hotaru,Neo Oriental Dress,Bright Eyes,Pretty Face,Calientes female body mod,Convenient Horses and YOU for download this :)..if you do of course U_U haha
author: Waldoman
